EmailTemplate.name: Incomplete Grants Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Incomplete Grants Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!User.Name},
Some awards that you created on the Government Grants Information System (GGIS) are incomplete and need updating. After logging in to the GGIS please click on the links below to view reports on your incomplete grant awards. Your username is your email address and if you don't know your password, please use the 'Forgot Password' option.
Grant Awards with no Actual Payment and Payment Frequency as Upfront Payment
Grant Awards with no Actual Payment and Payment Frequency as Instalment/ End or Ad-hoc Payments
Grant Awards with no Evaluation information
Regards, GGIS Team
